title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“No detail is too small to overlook.” [From an advertisement for a lawn product on KCMO-TV, Kansas City, Missouri, 20 April 1988. Submitted by Dorothy Branson, Kansas City.]
